sprint_plan.title: Project Documentation Setup
sprint_plan.description: Create README.md, IMPLEMENTATION_GUIDE.md, and HOW_TO_RUN.md with initial structure and placeholders.

sprint_plan.title: UI Mockup Generation
sprint_plan.description: Create UI_SCREENSHOTS.html with static mockups for key app views (Login, Signup, Dashboard, Habit Creation, Habit Detail).

sprint_plan.title: Implement User Authentication Screens
sprint_plan.description: Develop UI components and logic for User Account Creation and User Login screens.

sprint_plan.title: Integrate Firebase Authentication for Sign Up
sprint_plan.description: Connect frontend sign-up UI to Firebase Authentication and Firestore for user data storage.

sprint_plan.title: Integrate Firebase Authentication for Login
sprint_plan.description: Connect frontend login UI to Firebase Authentication.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Logout Functionality
sprint_plan.description: Develop the UI and logic for user logout, integrating with Firebase Authentication.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Create Micro-Habit Form
sprint_plan.description: Develop the UI form for creating a new micro-habit, including fields for name, frequency, and description.

sprint_plan.title: Firestore Integration for Habit Creation
sprint_plan.description: Implement backend logic to save new habits to Firestore, linked to the logged-in user.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Dashboard UI
sprint_plan.description: Develop the main dashboard screen layout to display habits and their streaks.

sprint_plan.title: Firestore Integration for Habit Retrieval and Display
sprint_plan.description: Implement fetching user's habits from Firestore and displaying them on the dashboard. Set up Firestore real-time listeners.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Habit Completion Interaction
sprint_plan.description: Develop the UI element for marking a habit as complete and handle the visual feedback.

sprint_plan.title: Firestore Integration for Habit Completion
sprint_plan.description: Implement saving habit completion records to Firestore and updating streak logic (can be client-side calculation initially, stored later).

sprint_plan.title: Implement Streak Visualization Logic
sprint_plan.description: Develop frontend logic to calculate and display current streaks based on completion data. Implement basic animations.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Reminder Setting UI
sprint_plan.description: Add UI elements within habit creation/editing to set daily reminder times.

sprint_plan.title: Integrate Local Notifications for Reminders
sprint_plan.description: Set up local notification scheduling for reminders on the mobile device.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Firestore Realtime Sync
sprint_plan.description: Ensure Firestore real-time listeners are correctly set up for habits and completions to sync across devices.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Local Caching Strategy
sprint_plan.description: Set up AsyncStorage for caching habit data to enable offline access.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Offline Check-in Logic
sprint_plan.description: Develop logic to save check-ins locally when offline and sync them to Firestore upon reconnection.

sprint_plan.title: Develop Habit Detail Screen UI
sprint_plan.description: Create the UI for viewing detailed history, including calendar view, current streak, and longest streak.

sprint_plan.title: Fetch and Display Detailed Habit History
sprint_plan.description: Implement logic to fetch historical completion data for a specific habit and display it.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Edit Habit UI
sprint_plan.description: Develop the UI for editing existing habit details (name, frequency, reminder).

sprint_plan.title: Firestore Integration for Habit Editing
sprint_plan.description: Implement backend logic to update habit details in Firestore.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Archive/Delete Habit UI
sprint_plan.description: Add UI elements and confirmation dialogs for archiving or deleting habits.

sprint_plan.title: Firestore Integration for Habit Archiving/Deletion
sprint_plan.description: Implement backend logic to update the 'archived' flag or delete habit documents in Firestore.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Password Reset Flow UI
sprint_plan.description: Develop the UI screens for the password reset process (request and confirmation).

sprint_plan.title: Integrate Firebase Password Reset
sprint_plan.description: Connect the UI to Firebase Authentication's password reset capabilities.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Basic Customization Settings UI
sprint_plan.description: Create a settings screen area for applying purchased themes/icons (initially placeholders).

sprint_plan.title: Implement Habit Template Selection UI
sprint_plan.description: Add UI for browsing and selecting habit templates during creation.

sprint_plan.title: Add Habit Templates Data
sprint_plan.description: Define and integrate a small set of initial habit templates.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Habit Categorization UI
sprint_plan.description: Add UI elements for creating, assigning, and viewing habit categories.

sprint_plan.title: Firestore Integration for Habit Categories
sprint_plan.description: Update habit data model and Firestore logic to support categories.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Data Export Functionality
sprint_plan.description: Develop the feature to export habit data, potentially as a CSV file.

sprint_plan.title: Implement Home Screen Widget
sprint_plan.description: Create a basic home screen widget for viewing streaks and quick check-ins.

sprint_plan.title: Setup Basic CI/CD Pipeline
sprint_plan.description: Configure GitHub Actions for basic automated builds and testing.

sprint_plan.title: Setup Local Development Environment
sprint_plan.description: Ensure Docker configurations and setup guides are in place for local development.
